SEARCH
Package com.tradingcards.elements.deck

Class DeckController

java.lang.Object
com.tradingcards.elements.deck.DeckController
public class DeckController extends Object
Controller class responsible for managing operations related to decks. This includes adding new decks, removing existing ones, and manipulating cards within decks by interacting with the shared collection and view.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a DeckController with the given shared collection and view.

  • Constructor Details

    • DeckController

      public DeckController(CollectionModel sharedCollection, DeckView view)
      Constructs a DeckController with the given shared collection and view.
      Parameters:
      sharedCollection - the shared CollectionModel containing the deck data
      view - the DeckView responsible for user interaction

  • Method Details

    • addDeck

      public void addDeck()
      Adds a new deck to the shared collection. Prompts the user for a unique deck name and creates the deck if valid. If the user inputs "-999", the operation is cancelled.

    • removeDeck

      public void removeDeck()
      Removes a specified deck from the shared collection. All cards in the deck are returned to the card collection. Cancels operation if user inputs "-999".

    • removeCard

      public void removeCard()
      Removes a specific card from a selected deck and returns it to the card collection. Cancels operation if user inputs "-999".

    • addCard

      public void addCard()
      Adds a card from the collection to a specified deck. Validates input and checks for quantity and deck size limits. Cancels operation if user inputs "-999".

    • displaySingleDeck

      public void displaySingleDeck()
      Displays the contents of a specified deck. Allows the user to select a card to view in detail by name or number. Cancels operation if user inputs "-999".

    • displayDeckContent

      public void displayDeckContent(HashMap<String,CardModel> deck)
      Displays the contents of the given deck. If the deck is empty, a message is shown.
      Parameters:
      deck - the deck to be displayed

    • chooseCardFromDeck

      public void chooseCardFromDeck(HashMap<String,CardModel> deck)
      Allows the user to view a card in the deck by name or number.
      Parameters:
      deck - the deck containing the cards to choose from

    • displayDecks

      public void displayDecks()
      Displays all available decks in the shared collection. If there are no decks, an appropriate message is shown.
